'''Shire''' can refer to: 
==Middle-earth==
*'''[[The Shire]]''', the land of the [[Hobbits]].
*[[Shire-buildings]], buildings such as the [[Shirriff-house]]s built by the [[Ruffians]] within the Shire.
*[[Shire-calendar]],
*[[Shire-fashion]]/[[Shiretalk]],
*[[Shire-folk]]/[[Shire-hobbits]],
*[[Shire-historians]],
*[[Shire-holidays]],
*[[Shire-thain]],
*[[Shire-lore]],
*[[Shire-moot]],
*[[Shire-muster]],
*[[Shire-reckoning]],
*[[Note on the Shire-records|Shire-records]],
*[[Shire-reform]],
*[[Shire-services]], the [[Messenger Service]] and the [[Watch]].
*[[Hobbitish|Shire-speech]] or [[Hobbitish|Hobbit-speech]],
*[[Shire-water]],
*[[Hobbitish|shire-words]],

In earlier drafts, '''Shire''' could refer to:

*[[Shire-borders]],
*[[Shire-buildings|Shire-houses]],
*[[Shire-fork]],
*[[Shire-thain|Shire-king]],
*[[Shire-fashion|Shire-like]],
*[[A Part of the Shire|Shire-map]],
*[[Hobbitish|Shire-name]],
*[[Hobbits|Shire-rats]],
*[[Shirriffs|Shire-reeve]],
*[[Shire-usage]],
*[[Shire-reckoning|Shire-years]],

==Adaptations and books==
*''[[The Shire (book)]]'', a 1995 game supplement for [[Middle-earth Role Playing]]
*''[[The Shire (soundtrack)]]'', a song on ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - The Complete Recordings]]''.
